name: Marmalade Thief
description:
Adventure through the village and find your grandma's missing Marmalade.

Welcome to our game and thank you for checking on!

This is a 2D detective puzzle game made in GBStudio, aiming to test our performance in making a game on a completely new environment as new developers.

Sophia's grandson starts one more day normaly, except his beloved marmalade is gone. He must then investigate the village and talk to people who live there in hope of finding who stole the familly's gourmet.

Controls (Keyboard):

Action: Z and X

Walk: Arrows

Starring:
  • Isaac Pais
  • José Martins
  • Romeu Fialho
Contact us:
  • teamsnake.dev@gmail.com

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT.  GAME IS  A PROTOTYPE.

In case you want to provide feedback to our game, please fill out our form!

https://forms.gle/nkBFLb8CtMP7fHhk8
